entries.description: Amazon Q Security Scans: Fixed unnecessary yellow lines appearing in both auto scans and project scans.
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed prompt input becomes invisible if an html special character is inserted
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed button font sizes are too big
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed buttons don't show borders inside a message
Amazon Q Code Transform: Link UI messages to troubleshooting docs
Amazon Q /dev command: improve user error messages
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed button texts are cropped too short
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed prompt input and selected command horizontal alignment
Amazon Q Chat: Fixed prompt input becomes invisible when multine text inserted with paste
Q feature dev: Only use relevant code and related files
